sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-app>
    <v-app-bar app>
      <v-pagination
        v-model="currentPage"
        :length="totalPages"
        @input="onPageChange"
      ></v-pagination>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn @click="handleButton1">Button 1</v-btn>
      <v-btn @click="handleButton2">Button 2</v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <v-container>
        <slot></slot> <!-- Content will be injected here -->
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
    <Composer v-if="isComposing" @close_composer="toggleCompose"/>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import Composer from './Composer.vue'
    export default{
      data(){
        return{
          isComposing: false,
          page: 1,
        }
      },
      components: {
        Composer,
      },
      methods: {
        toggleCompose(){
          this.isComposing = !this.isComposing
        }
      }
    }
  </script>
  
<style>
  .message_view {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }
  .message_view .bottom-right-button {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 7%;
    right: 4%;
    padding: 25px;
    background-color: transparent;
    color: #023047;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 50%;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 25px;
  }

  .message_view .bottom-right-button:hover{
    background-color: #FB8500;
  }

  .message_view .pagination{
    color: #023047;
  }
</style>
